content: light pink ch3 starting from the 2nd chain from hook 2hdc fasten_off attach under the mouth as shown in the photo the tails can be tied behind the snout to secure once finished attach the snout just under the eyes lightly stuff before closing off face patches make two in dark brown and two in white ch7 starting from the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch single_crochet 2hdc single_crochet slip_stitch a tail can be left for sewing or it may be glued onto the face attach onto head as shown in the photos first attach the dark brown patches nearest to the snout followed by the white patches eyebrows in white left side ch4 starting from the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet fasten_off right side ch4 starting from the 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch fasten_off attach diagonally across 2-3 row above the eyes use photos as a reference 2 1 3 @babymoocrochet ear make two outer ear in white r1 4sc in magic_ring 4 r2 4inc 8 r3 8sc 8 r4 single_crochet increase *4 12 r5 12sc 12 r6 2sc increase *4 16 fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing inner ear make two in dark brown ch4 starting from the 2nd chain from hook single_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet fasten_off and leave a tail for sewing sew the inner ear sideways onto the outer ear as shown in the photo the outer ear may be sewn close before attaching to head attach ears to the head approximately 4 row from the magic_ring centre and approximately 3 stitches from the eyebrows or 4 stitches from the eyes @babymoocrochet tail in dark brown r1 6sc in magic_ring 6 r2 6inc 12 r3 single_crochet increase *6 18 r4 2sc increase *6 24 r5-6 24sc 24 2 rounds stuff tail lightly as you go along change to rust r7-9 24sc 24 3 rounds change to dark brown r10-12 24sc 24 3 rounds change to rust r13 2sc decrease *6 18 r14-15 18sc 18 2 rounds change to dark brown r16-18 18sc 18 3 rounds change to rust r19-21 18sc 18 3 rounds *** change to dark brown r22-23 18sc 18 2 rounds r24 single_crochet decrease *6 12 change to rust cut dark brown and tie off or carry under rust colour r25-26 12sc 12 2 rounds fasten_off and leave a tail for sewing ***if you would like a really long tail continue the pattern of alternating the colour after three row when the desired length is achieved continue using instructions from row 22 @babymoocrochet body in rust r1 6sc in magic_ring 6 r2 6inc 12 r3 single_crochet increase *6 18 r4 2sc increase *6 24 r5 3sc increase *6 30 r6 4sc increase *6 36 r7-8 36sc 36 2 rounds colour change is indicated by font colour rust- orange dark brown black r9-10 sc12 sc12 sc12 36 2 rounds r11 4sc decrease *2 4sc decrease *2 4sc decrease *2 30 r12-20 10sc 10sc 10sc 30 9 rounds r21 3sc decrease *2
